title: New missions; darkin path / shadow path
body: how do you make any progress, I was playing against kayne in aram but didn't get any progress?{{champion:141}}

replies.body:
Broporo is incorrect... You do NOT have to play as Kayn to complete these missions. 

I was in an ARAM as Ivern and I had a Kayn on my team. We lost the game and my mission did not immediately reflect playing a game as, with, or against Kayn. I logged out and back in a few hours later and it shows as I have 1/5 of Darkin Path. 

Just now I was in an ARAM as Teemo - no Kayn on either team. I got a killing spree but my mission does not show that part completed. I will edit if it shows up later. You may need a Kayn on either team to get credit for all missions? Would suck if you have to play AS him to finish the win/kill parts. I really hope I don't have to buy a champion just to do this...

Only the 1st part of each mission may be completed by not playing AS Kayn. And yes, there still has to be a Kayn on one of the teams.

As far as other missions go, does it really surprise anyone that Riot would make certain missions have a champion specific requirement as well as a short completion window thereby "forcing" you to spend RP to get said champion? It just seems like a normal business model to me.

I mean, how else is Riot supposed to make money?! /s

It can be missed pretty easily, but those missions need to be completed *while playing as Kayn* in each form. 

https://i.gyazo.com/23a8f76325f980ca71f2eda34b596a8d.png

Not necessarily true. Read the WHOLE sentence that you marked. It says "except where noted". Even in the 1st part of each section it says to play "as, WITH, or AGAINST" each form. The issue is that the missions don't always register in maps other than Summoner's Rift.

only the first part of each mission has freedom to it
the 2nd and 3rd ones have to be done as kayn
"unless it says you don't have to play as kayn, you have to play as kayn" #paraphrase

Please properly read the context of posts before replying. 

I was correcting Broporo who stated that you HAVE to play as Kayn to complete the missions when in fact you DON'T. I never said nor even remotely implied that you have to do the missions NOT as Kayn.

I just won a game with a teamate playing as kayn and i didnt get credit for the 'win one game' or the 'get a double kill'
Im super mad at riot. Shouldnt force people to ruin other players games for a stupid event, by making us play crap we suck at
